text:
FYI If anyone's been curious or interested about the new <https://www.polywork.com/|Polywork> social platform, I just got in and have some invite codes!
It's a nice clean space, and the major differences (off the hop) seem to be a beefed up tagging and content organization system, compared to the hashtag soup of the other mainstream socials. It's also focused on professional connections so more of a LI alternative I guess.

I also like idea of being able to subdomain your feed to act as part of a profile website.

Shoot me a DM if you want an invite link / code :slightly_smiling_face:
